## IConfigurableTab.context property

The set of contextItem scopes that a tab belong to

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
context?: ("channelTab" | "privateChatTab" | "meetingChatTab" | "meetingDetailsTab" | "meetingSidePanel" | "meetingStage")[];
```
